attributes.action: bring in an act that will require the Minister responsible for any government department that happens to leak personal information to write to each affected person individually explaining the situation, apologising, and the means of restitution.  Each letter is to be individually hand signed by the Minister in person.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The gross incompetence of the HMRC losing several sets of data recently is appalling.  The idea of Alistair Darling having to spend many years hand signing 25 million letters of apology to the victims would at least make the government take this issues a little more seriously.
